amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 501 from the bill which relates to administrative provisions of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 501 from the bill which relates to administrative provisions of the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection, specifically, the repeal of section 1017(a)(2)(C) of Public Law 111-203.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 244 (Roll no. 411).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 244 (Roll no. 411).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Ms. Moore.
